this game is very fun to play with a squad. But even if you don't play with a squad you also learn more aim skills and team work.

It's gone down hill since it became free-to-play, but it still offers the exciting match-making experience that you crave with team mates just beware of the hackers that still lurk within CS:GO matchmaking. If you don't like matchmaking you can also play other game modes such as casual game modes, wing-man and a host of other game modes such the new Danger zone, much like a battleroyale, just counter-strike style.
full of cheaters and never protected, now this game is free so any cheaters can now get banned and create another account without paying anything

I would play this game if you like first person action packed shooters. This game in my opinion is mixed because The game play and overall quality of the game is great but the community has seen better days. The only thing I dislike is how ranks in this game just don't reset and when they do its like every year, so in order to get to a higher tier you would need to devote a lot of time into this game.
